de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.dict.translator

Class Translator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.dict.translator.Translator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AkkadToEngTranslator, AkkadToGerTranslator, ToAkkadTranslator

    public abstract class Translator
extends java.lang.Object
    Translator class for creating translators.
